title: Needs Serious Re-write
text: Such a shame, could be really great fun if the developers would fix their algorithm to make the balls roll true. Unfortunately I‚Äôm done with this game. It‚Äôs just too frustrating to play two or three games and have over a dozen scratches, watching the cue ball curve towards pockets with unrealistic curvature, pockets acting like black holes seemingly sucking the cue ball in with no the or reason. Even the most amateur players I. Real life don‚Äôt scratch ten times a game, but it happens here - often. Balls rolling with plenty of momentum suddenly stop- right behind another ball leaving players no shot several times a game as well. Clearly some of these things are intentionally programmed into the algorithm to increase difficulty or whatever, but it‚Äôs too unrealistic and ruins the gaming experience. Close but no cigar here.
